availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Turner J. Evans (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 5A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Potato Patch, p. 502.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Potato Patch, p. 206A.
"Turner James Evans (1802-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial 109057093, accessed January 20, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/109057093.
